website_summaries.verdict: A popular option recognized for its incredible quality at a bargain price point.
pros: Provides strong protection for both front and back of iPad
Lightweight, durable material is great for traveling
cons: Not great option if you are looking for drop protection for more than four feet

customer_reviews.title: Protective and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I typically don't buy Speck cases for my iPhone but I thought this would be great for a soft portfolio style case for my iPad. The pad has magnets throughout so that the camera is protected and the angles can be changed based on what you're doing. I can lean this in my lap, on my desk, or even while cooking without issues. The charging port, on/off button, and sound buttons are easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: aliveinjoburg

customer_reviews.title: Not up to the standards set by Speck
customer_reviews.text: Camera cover is baffling, don’t see a need for it. It’s Magnet not strong enough. It is easy to accidentally open the camera cover while in reality you are trying to adjust volume up-down buttons. This product is priced at premium and as such falls short of the expectations. One good thing is raised lip across the screen edges and definitely this will protect iPad in event of accidental fall. Cutouts are good, accurate. I am worried about small plastic clip but only time will tell how long it will last. Not the best from speck.
customer_reviews.author: mYnk

customer_reviews.title: As great as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Nice ipad case! We got the plum colored one. It’s a very pretty color. Easy to put on the ipad and works just as described!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SJSIMS

customer_reviews.title: Design faded after 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case, but the design as totally faded off after only 3 months of use. Definitely not the quality I expected from Speck. I had my prior Speck iPad case for 3 years without issue. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P

customer_reviews.title: Even Prettier than the Pictures
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a cover for her iPad. I bought her this one as a surprise. She thought she was getting a plain one. She was very excited when she saw such a pretty design for her instead of a plain solid color. It has all the same options as the basic as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Hisey

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice case but you will need some tool to open the side notch or you will be breaking your fingernails - it’s too tight
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great Except For Camera Flap
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Speck iPad case I've purchased over the years, but the first with a magnetic flap cover for the camera. I thought it was a great idea until I received the case. The magnet is very weak, so the cover flips open very easily and often, which is why I didn't give this item five stars. The rest of the case features are classic Speck excellence, so if you can put up with the camera cover, it's worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Cover is ok
customer_reviews.text: Cover is fine. Would be nice if it could stand in the portrait orientation. Thought it was a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Yons

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my IPad, and It's okay enough. I had issues figuring out how to reveal the back camera, but I found out it's magnetic and you can pull the square down. I wish it had a loop for the apple pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Madi K

customer_reviews.title: iPad protection
customer_reviews.text: Had this brand of case for my old iPad so when I got a new iPad, this is the case I got again. It’s sturdy and now has a cover over the camera lens that easily flips open to use.
customer_reviews.author: patcallard

customer_reviews.title: Best case for new generation iPad
customer_reviews.text: Fits my new 7th generation iPad well. The cutouts are exactly lined up and I love the small magnetic cover to protect the camera lense. Best part though is the extra magnetic strip to keep the case from falling open when I just want to flip the cover back! Will definitely recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful case for my iPad. I usually only purchase speck...they are fairly durable and last a couple of years. I recommend this case as it is pretty and fun colors.
customer_reviews.author: Annawee

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: While the case seems pretty sturdy it does not fit the iPad very well. The top where the volume buttons are is not held in properly. Very disappointed as the same brand case I had for my mini iPad fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Manegold

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Liked the way it fit the IPad. The flip down for the camera looks to be a nice feature, but have not tried it. Case is very durable to protect the IPad.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ellen Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Sent item back
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an iPad cover that allowed an angle to prop device. This one did not meet my needs
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Dobie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my kids iPad and she really likes it. Holding up good with no problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Krepela

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love the sleek design. Speck is always provided whatI like.
customer_reviews.author: rubix2607

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Top quality case for my new iPad! Don’t hesitate to purchase this case. Yes it cost more than the sone cases but the quality is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: SCN

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really like it and just what I needed. Love that you can lock it when you close it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne L. Garvis

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work with newer ipad air 2020
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt fit as it should for newer ipad air 2020 as advertise. Good material though.
customer_reviews.author: periwinkle103

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that such a pretty case would be so durable, but I have put this case to the test and it ranked well above my expectations. Delivery was faster than expected, the case is beautiful and durable, and I have no issues at all with this product. It even has a holder for my Apple Pencil! It was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits new 2020 iPad (8th generation)
customer_reviews.text: It’s not listed but this case fits the new 2020 iPad (8th generation) which has the same 10.2 screen size as iPad 2019.
customer_reviews.author: KA HUNNICUTT

customer_reviews.title: as long as doesn't break the case and make sure to get a hard case thats right for you
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed my ipad case its amazing, i like how my camera on my ipad close the cover so it doesn't scratch
customer_reviews.author: Shinobi

customer_reviews.title: Not the right color
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice case, but i ordered the marine blue/clear color and the back has black on it instead of blue. Kinda bummed but it’s okay
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Rose Gold doesn’t look like pictures.
customer_reviews.text: The Rose Gold looks nothing like the pictures. It’s a study case and protective. The Rose Gold came and it’s looks like it sparkles. It’s matted and looks fades with sparkles.
customer_reviews.author: joanie harris

customer_reviews.title: Good for watching movies.
customer_reviews.text: The only negative thing I found was the latch is hard to work. You'll need strong fingers and fingernails to open. Locking it is no problem. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Reliable iPad cover.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the new iPad! Much easier than a shlep to the store only to find out they’re not in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Jason I. Ser

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My mom love this ! Very easy to use and flexible! It’s also very sturdy, whatever way you set it up it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Functional with extras
customer_reviews.text: Memaw loves it. It has a locking feature and a place to hold the stylus which she never had before. Perfectly fits the 7th Gen iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Jo Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and sturdy, practical case
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Just what i needed. Nice that one can fold the case and use the ipad upright on a flat surface. Apoears to be durable and easy to keep clean. You can take pictures with the case on your device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Serves the purpose of a cover for my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia E Zeits

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love my new case,one reviewer gave it a low rating by the camera is blocked—I was concerned but when I received it I saw it’s covered by a magnetic flap. Way to go speck, another great product
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hohorst

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Stays upright for watching video better than most other cases. Several tilt adjustments and a flipping cover for the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R Depusoir

customer_reviews.title: Made to last
customer_reviews.text: So durable. Had one for my last iPad which was bend in half, but the case was not impacted at all. Love them, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: GACS4

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with new iPad Air!
customer_reviews.text: Case does not line up with (speakers, charging port, or camera) the new iPad air 2019! Thumbs down!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Bitler

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Beautiful colors and pattern. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Bannister

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this case for our 12 year old daughter and it is very nice. It’s durable but not bulky. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good product that I bought a second one! Speck is such a good brand!
customer_reviews.author: RaeAnn Macedo

customer_reviews.title: Love Speck cases! Never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: I have always relied on Speck for all of my phone/iPad products.
customer_reviews.author: minnierockstar

product_meta.title: Speck 133535-1050 Products BalanceFolio iPad 10.2 Inch Case and Stand (2019), Black/Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black/BlackBalance FOLIO has been tested to withstand drops up to 4 feet for our best tablet protection yet A raised bezel protects your iPad's screen during a drop while the recessed cover keeps the case feeling slim It features a soft edge-to-edge liner that guards your iPad against scratches The case also turns into a convenient stand for typing or viewing and has a magnetic camera shield
feature_bullets: Dropped from 4 feet multiple times by Independent labs to ensure superior protection
A full interior liner provides scientifically engineered protection to resists scuffs and abrasions to your tablet
Multi-angle stand cover converts into a stand for typing and allows you to adjust the angle for viewing videos
Locking Clasp Ensures the cover stays securely closed to protect the screen in the event of a fall
Magnetic camera Shield on the back cover allow you to shield your camera lens When it's not in use and easily retracts for when you want to snap a photo

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars253 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
